content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friends in pleasant unity one night just talking and hanging out.  we usually drink beer, but i did not this night.  somewhere between 2:00 and 3:00 am, i left to head back to my parents house on 982 just east of baggaley.  as i passed the latrobe airport, i saw a strange light over the ridge.  it was very bright and i could not make out the shape of the object making the light.  it was flashing irregularly, but not fast. i pulled over to watch it.  it seemed to just hover over the tree line at the top of the ridge, then systematically move down hill.  then it would move back to the top of the ridge a little to the east and do it again.  as i watched, i flashed my headlights in an attempt to get their attention.  then, out of the corner of my eye, i saw what appeared to be a very large vessel very high up in the air.  it was mainly pink and kind of blimp shaped.  it had what appeared to be lights around the center, but i can't recall what color they were now.

i was so excited, i got in my car and drove the few miles left to my house.  my plan was to wake my mother up to see them if they were still visible.  they were not visible from our house, so i just went to bed.

the next day, i went back to my friends house in pleasant unit, and there were what appeared to be army personnel all around the fence surrounding the latrobe airport. then later that night as i was going home via the same route, there was something on the runway (out of view as it was down in a gully) that was flashing and lighting up the sky.  i don't recall seeing army personnel then.
content.summary: Light hovering over the ridge and a "mother ship" following.

content.detailedDescription:
I am just getting around to describing an event that occurred when i was six years old, in or around the summer of 1979, that left a strong impression with me that lasts to this day and has informed my world view as i have gotten older. i have never forgotten it, and my brief (less than a minute, probably more like 15-20 seconds) encounter is burned in my brain like a movie. i have talked about it my whole life to friends and family and other people that i felt would be mature about it, and my story has changed zero through retelling and the passage of time; my memory is crystal clear on this event in spite of my young age at the time of the event, and the experience was interesting enough that it doesn't need embellishment or creative additions or for me to try to speculate on it for it to be the most interesting thing i have seen with my own eyes before or since.

i was 6 going on 7 and with my mother in a diner in albany, ga, sitting at a booth with wide windows that stretched the width of the restaurant and went floor-to-ceiling (typical diner layout where the walls are essentially windows all the way around), affording a clear view of outside including the sky. it was a clear night, and having recently become a young and frequent airplane traveler with my family, i was fascinated with airplanes and obsessively watched planes in the sky.

this night as i was watching planes slowly fly across the horizon through our table's window pane (albany has a small regional airport and a significant military presence, as i will expand on later, hence the airplanes), i saw something which i thought very unusual at the time, and i am still fascinated by it. i was young, but the experience is burned in my memory as though it was yesterday, and i feel that my memory is still very pure, and hasn't been complicated by the information on the ufo phenomenon that i have since come to be interested in.

i was young and unfortunately did not know which directions (n,s,e,w) anything was at that point in my life. no idea which direction it flew. i noticed out of the corner of my eye a very intense green light in the sky through the far left side of the window pane at our booth. it was travelling left to right on a horizontal (to the ground) trajectory (straight horizontal line) much quicker than the obvious airplanes i was watching (there were several planes over the course of our visit to the diner). the green light phenomenon behaved differently from anything i had ever observed, and i loved to watch the sky for airplanes all the time. it moved from left to right at a seemingly quick clip. i locked eyes on it, and when it reached the middle of my vantage point it abruptly stopped (on a dime, instantly), pulsed (became visually bigger by about double), then just as quickly went back to it's original size and took off at about a 45% angle towards the sky. when it took off from this momentary stop, it went so fast that if i had blinked i would have thought it had simply disappeared. but i saw it leave, and it was gone in a fraction of a second. the first half of the flight path, prior to it pulsing, took probably 15-20 seconds, long enough for me to lock eyes on it, get excited and try to get my mom and other adults' attention. but when it left it was gone in the blink of an eye. no one else saw it, but my obvious excitement caused a great deal of others to get excited in the restaurant. everyone felt i was sincere and too young to have just made it up, that i had definitely seen something strange. being so young i don't think i even knew about the ufo phenomena and was just excited over this unusual light and i wanted an adult to see it and tell me what it was, i didn't have the vocabulary or knowledge of the subject to call it a ufo or to speculate that it was alien. i figured an adult would know what it was. i just recognized it was unusual compared to planes which i knew something about (and was obsessed with), and was extraordinarily fast. there was talk among those at the diner about calling the paper, they really took me to be sincere in that i at least believed that i saw what i saw. my mom decided to not allow the paper to be called because she is not the type to want the hassle and complication in her and my life, and she didn't want me to be mocked over it or get a reputation as a weirdo in such a conservative area of the country. star wars was all the rage with my age group and it would have been easy to chalk it all up to an active imagination from a star wars-obsessed boy, which i admittedly was, along with every other kid in my age in the 70s. but that was a movie and i never made an association between that light in the southwest georgia sky and movie science fiction. i just didn't have "ufo" in my vocabulary or as a point of reference.

one thing that i swear happened, or that i felt strongly (and still do) had happened, was that the phenomenon seemed to be aware that i had seen it and had locked eyes on it. i feel that when it stopped and pulsed before shooting off, that that was a communication to me, like "hello, we know you see us, and we see you and are saying hello". i can't explain why, but i truly felt right there at the time that i had exchanged some sort of simple greeting with the phenomenon, or that it had specifically acknowledged me, and that the interaction was friendly and as real as if someone physically in my presence were to talk to me. i can't explain in words why i felt/feel that way, it was just as though a message or feeling entered my head, i'll use the word "telepathically" now (although i knew nothing of telepathy or anomalous phenomena at the time of the event to have used that word or concept) and it was a real phenomenon that i didn't have the capacity, imagination, or environmental influence to invent at that age.

the phenomenon itself was a very intense green light, roughly the size or a small but easily visible star. like a pinprick way up in the sky. when it pulsed it became roughly double in size. the green light was very pure, very bright, very sharp, not fuzzy at all around the edges. small but very defined. the color of green was purer that any green light i have seen before or since, just pure, deep, and beautiful, unwavering, not flickering, and very deep and intense (though small) in a way that is difficult to put into words but not like a typical light in the sky. it was a very, for lack of better vocabulary, unearthly in it's perfection and depth and brilliance. it did not change color at all. just the most amazing brilliant green i have ever seen, something no light i have ever known quite reaches in terms of brilliance and depth, and also focus (no halo, so blurred edges, just very tight and compressed if you will).

as i mentioned, i didn't have any knowledge or background in ufo lore or the phenomenon or flying saucers or whatever at all at that age. i didn't have the information to speculate it was alien or to call it a ufo. those concepts just weren't something i knew about yet. i did not try to classify it at the time or act like i had a theory on what it was, i wouldn't have known where to start, i was just very excited and my excitement excited those around me. everyone believed that i saw something that had genuinely aroused me, i didn't invent it, nobody thought i did, and my main concern after the event was to ask the adults present to explain to me what it was. i tried like crazy to get an adult's attention in the short time i was observing it, just so a grownup could explain to me what it was. i assumed that adults present would know and that it would be some mundane thing that i got all excited about but that adults would explain as common. but it was the adults that brought the idea of a ufo into the conversation and some advocated calling the media. unfortunately, by the time i made enough of a scene to get peoples' attention, the phenomenon was gone. i was the only direct witness, but many people witnessed my reaction and listened to my description. my mother and i still talk about it. she says that i was fully taken at my word, that i could not have faked the excitement, and that the consensus was that, at best i had seen something very strange, and at worst i had seen nothing especially strange but that i was truthful in my belief that i had.

i will repeat that i did not have the knowledge of the very real ufo phenomena to have applied a ufo hypothesis to what i saw. i didn't have the basic knowledge at that age to say ufo, flying saucer, alien, or anything like that, i simply wasn't aware that those were things or debates that were in society's culture. totally ignorant of the phenomenon. i was in first or second grade.

full disclosure, and this is something i have come to know as time passed: there was and still is an active marine corps logistic base in the area and i believe that a now defunct navy base was still operational in albany at the time as well. i am fully acknowledging that i may have seen a military craft doing something that to me was unknown exotic technology and seemed un-airplane like, but certainly could have been military technology. that's the simplest explanation, really, and i'm not claiming it was an et craft by any means. it'd be cool if it was for sure, but i will not pretend to know something that i don't know, or ignore the real and likely possibility that i indeed saw something of this earth. maybe it was military or even something else. but i have never seen anything before or since that was anything like it. the indescribably strange nature or the green light, the ability to stop/pause on a dime, and then to take off from a complete stop at an inestimable but incredible rate of speed at a 45% angle from it prior path...It was an awesome display of aeronautics if nothing else.

a few things i must freely own up to: i have no idea now big in size the object/light was, how far away it was, how fast it actually moved, the direction of travel or it's elevation. i was simply too young to be thinking about those things or have any perspective. i doubt anyone could have figured it out actually, it was a pin-prick of light very high on the horizon, above the airplanes that i saw by quite a bit, with nothing that i recall to provide a scale comparison. no mountains. there is no photo obviously to try to make measurements. i do know absolutely that from my vantage point it was the size of a small but clearly discernible star (except when it briefly pulsed and seemed to temporarily double in size.) was it huge and far away? was it smaller and closer? i don't know. before speeding off, if it had simply maintained it's original speed and direction it would have crossed the width of my view considerably faster than the airplanes i was watching. it took planes two minutes or more to cross the horizon from my vantage point and you could easily trace their path slowly and see their normal airplane lights and beacon lights (i knew about identifying common airplanes because i had recently become an air traveler and planes were basically my #1 fascination at that time). this was definitely not just a garden-variety airplane. maybe a black-project development from our military, but nothing normal as far as i knew or know now, and i am an avid sky watcher.

i don't know what i saw, but it has been quite meaningful to me and is frequently in my thoughts even 30+ years later, and the experience has always stayed with me, become a part of who i am, and has shaped me in some strange ways. i felt i was communicated with by the phenomenon, that we had the equivalent of a real-world "head nod", like a non-verbal communication, something like "hey what's up, i see you seeing me, so hello! and now we are gone". i felt like that message imprinted in me and it was real. i still feel as though i had a brief, non-threatening contact of sorts. whether i saw something otherworldly or not, i am different for having seen it, because i feel fairly sure that i know something that the rest of the world doesn't truly know, saw something few ever see, and they argue and speculate about it, but i know that anomalous stuff is in the sky definitely and it's special knowledge that many argue about but few possess. i may be wrong, but my gut says i saw something very special and had some form of casual contact with the phenomenon. i knew it was there and it knew i knew it was there, and it just sort of said "hi". this may be the active imagination of a kid, and i will freely acknowledge that this could be something mundane and that i had a curious nature and an active imagination as a kid. and star wars had all us kids thinking about space ships and whatnot. but i just didn't know about ufos at all and wasn't creating a ufo experience simply because i didn't have any knowledge of the ufo phenomenon and thus could not have associated my experience at that time with something that i didn't have any perspective or knowledge of. i was just amazed by an amazing sight in the sky, and had the unshakable feeling (still do) that whatever it was acknowledged me in a friendly way via "psychic" (for lack of a better word) communication.

as i got older i became more fascinated by the ufo phenomenon, and now i consider myself as knowledgeable about the subject as many experts and far more than the "man on the street". this experience fed that lifelong fascination. i continue to watch the skies every night from my back yard in the country, and i have seen other spectacular lights and seemingly anomalous movements semi-regularly. i don't pretend to know what any of them are, and i don't claim that they are alien, many are probably satellites, exotic military craft, drones, you name it. none have been so clear as to seem like a sure-fire classic ufo case. once i was even faked out by venus. my wife was once faked out by fireflies out of season. i'll be the first to admit that strange things in the sky can and often are mundane, and they can appear anomalous due to any number or factors including human error.

that said, this 30+ year old experience and, whatever i saw, it strongly impacted me. i am a different person with different beliefs and a different way of looking at life than if this hadn't happened. i've never been normal since, not in a bad way, i just feel like more is out there than general society wants to acknowledge, and i can't ignore what i at least think i know about the nature of our world and universe, and the (to me) fact that stuff happens in our skies that we can't easily explain. most people are willfully ignorant to this and just think you are weird if you show enthusiasm for ufos and whatnot. those that believe, it's preaching to the choir. i have zero evidence, and nothing i say here will change anyone's opinion, and it probably isn't an important thing to have written as far as contributing to the greater conversation. 

but i wanted to write it down for myself if nothing else. i have been telling the story to select people for my whole life, and my mother and i still talk about it frequently, but i have never documented it. now i have decided to. it feels great to have written this down and shared it, a bit of catharsis, and now i feel like i can think about the meaning of this experience less and use my mind on stuff that is future and present-related, not live in the past so much. it's a strange thing when your world view is so profoundly shaped by a <1 minute experience from 35 years ago that no one else witnessed. not a bad thing, i just hope that now that i've put everything in writing and explained the story as well as i can given the limitations of my vocabulary and published it in a forum, it can take it's place as a cool memory but not something i have to dwell on in middle-age. i kind of need to move on. 

i hope somebody with the time, patience, and interest to read this long convoluted story will enjoy it and maybe it will help someone make sense of their own experience. if this benefits nobody, that's unfortunate but really this is mostly something i (selfishly) need to do for myself in documenting this experience which has so profoundly impacted me, and maybe now it will require less mental energy from me going forward.

a final note that may be neither here nor there...I was born during the ufo flap of 1973. sightings were being reported all over the place in georgia. 1979 was active too, and as i delve through archives i find that i was not the only person observing strange things in the sky. jimmy carter had his sighting in georgia within a few years of mine, and many others (a disproportionate number) were reported and witnessed in georgia around that time. also, i have always felt and at times have manifested some psychic abilities, although i can't control them or use them in any practical way. it's not up to me, but sometimes i find myself just simply knowing something that there is no way i should know. occasionally i have found that i seem to have some control/influence over certain people i meet, that they trust and follow me blindly, without me encouraging it, and i have no explanation for it, just the observation that i seem to be able to control and exert influence on certain (not even close to all) people, it's not something i try to do or can control, i just seem to occasionally induce certain people to behave in a way that suits me without really trying, like in whats seems to me a primitive telepathic way, some people i can tune into sometimes, but not with a great deal of control, it just happens. hard to explain and maybe a whole different rabbit trail. i can't say for sure, but i feel like this very low-level bit of psychic ability and awareness of things seems to have begun when i had what i believe was communication from the phenomenon during the event.
content.summary: Pinpoint of green light, moving fast parallel to horizon before pulsing and taking off fast at a 45 deg angle towards space

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was me and my two cousins out for a drive around 10:30 at night. we went for a quick restroom stop at the nearest park available. we all exited the car with my two cousins walking towards the building, when i noticed three, pulsating lights, hovering about 500-600 ft. in the area. i looked at my nearest cousin and asked, "do you see that?" we were both in denial, as he assumed it was three helicopters. i yelled for my other cousin to see it. we acknowledged there was no helicopter sound, rather than a hum/buzz. as we proceeded to watch the orbs hover, they slowly hovered towards us, turning from a triangle shape, into a boomerang formation. they seemed to descend, but the orbs were disappearing, one by one, as it was detaching itself, and leaving the area on its own. we rushed to the car in shock and awe, having no clue who we could tell, and if anyone would believe us. 

after driving away from the sight, two minutes driving on the nearest parkway back home, i quickly noticed two black helicopters, flying away from the area we came from. i'm the only one taking initiative to remotely speak about this, since we were the only ones in the area to witness such an frightening sight. 

i was the driver, and i'm only 17 years old. please tell us we're not the only ones. we needed someone to talk to about this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering, then slowly decending with fading lights. over playground.

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside talking on the phone i noticed an usual object flying above the tree line.  it looked similar to a disco ball starting out traveling west eventually it dropped below the tree line.  shortly thereafter it came back into heading back the way it came from.  eventually it was out of sight.  i attempted to get photographs but only one came out.  randomly (maybe) one of the pictures came back black but had an orange orb looking item in the picture.   if you zoom into the star looking thing in the upper right hand corner of the photo named castile sighting you will be able to see it's mysterious shape.
content.summary: Orb that looked similar to a disco ball that changed directions

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1143 i went out for a smoke i was just stairing at the sky but there was nothing a couple of min go by and and i hear the weird hum/jetlike sound so i look up and and there was these 5 lights that made a triangle then 2 of the lights changed position to make a dyimand like shap then back to the triangle i watch this for about 20 min then faster then a split sec this thing shot up into the sky and was gone
content.summary: Weird sound and lights up above

content.detailedDescription: 3 bright lights coming from the east at a slow rate of speed.Red over our house for approx 15 minutes. disappeared straight up in a second into the atmosphere.
content.summary: 3 bright lights from the east

content.detailedDescription: I saw this light in the sky and initially thought it was an airplane spraying for mosquitos. i then realized the pattern was erratic and not in a straight line, there wasn't a red light, but just a bluish/white light that pulsed, not strobed. sometimes it went out for several seconds. the lighting was not consistent with commercial aviation. also the flight pattern varied from similar to a helicopter to an erratic jumping around to faster than a jet. i drove half a mile still watching it. i found a security guard on a parking lot and asked him to turn around. when he turned, and i don't think it was because he turned, it speed off faster than anything i've ever seen and was out of sight in less than five seconds, off the horizon. when it left the pulse of the light increased. i did not hear a sound, but there was other road traffic in the area. i have learned to delete unnecessary data from my phone. the short clip would have been six to ten seconds longer and showed the objects departure if i would have had more memory.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light that moved and acted different than anything i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were watching television in our respective rooms when he started yelling, "ma, look out the window, they're back". i ran to south facing window in my room and saw a brilliant golden globe hovering in the sky. i was ecxited because this is the first golden object we've seen. usually they are white or red, blue, and green. i threw on my robe, grabbed my binoculars and ran outside to southwest corner of my building and viewed the object through binoculars. it was a golden sphere that when viewed through binoculars showed a reflective surface. if i held my arm out straight i could have covered it with an apirin tablet. i viewed it for about forty more seconds when it became extremely bright and ascended in a straight southwestly trajection until it was too small to see. i ran back to the house and asked my husband, "did you see that, too"? he confirmed that he did and that was it. other than our adrenaline flowing from the recent event, the rest of the evening was uneventful.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Golden sphere hovered for appr. 1.5 mins. then ascended to the stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north bound on route 35 with me my wife and children.  my wife and i noticed two glowing lights at a very low altitude.  when we got closer to the objects we realized that it was not a plane.  there was one glowing white ball heading east and a red glowing ball right behind it just above the tree line.  it appeared that the red ball of light was chasing the white ball of light. the white ball of light was much faster and proceeded to gain speed on the red ball of light. both lights were moving at a very fast speed.  i turned to a side road to follow but lost visual contact.  later that night me and my wife were home and at approx.  11:30 11:45pm we herd a loud helicopter passing over our house.  we both ran outside thinking there might be a correlation and upon observing the helicopter we observed two shooting star like objects above the helicopter.  there might have been no correlation but it was just weird to see two shooting star like objects above the helicopter after we just had the ball of lights experience.  thank you
content.summary: Two glowing lights at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 2230 on 6/22/15 or 6/23/15 i noticed a small cloud moving  from south to north-or slightly northwest.  it was unusual because all the clouds that night had been moving from west to east. this particular cloud was the only one in the sky i could see at the time. since the direction of travel was odd, i took out my phone to record the event, but it was too dark for it to record anything.  after i put my phone away and looked back up at the object, it had changed.  now it appeared, not as a cloud, but as a white light the magnitude of a relatively bright star surrounded by a whitish mist or aura.  i went inside to retrieve a pair of bionaculars. when i stepped back outside, the object had changed once again.  now it appeared as a cloud. through bionoculars, it appeared as a bright smug on the sky. the closest analog to its appearance would be a search light reflected off a cloud. the elapsed time from initially spotting the cloud until it disappeared over the horizon was approximately five minutes. the cloud-object was traveling in a straight line at what seemed to be the speed of a jetliner at cruising altitude; although, i don't know the height or distance away of the object so this assumption is relative.
content.summary: Small cloud which later dissipated revealing white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was  on vacation in eilat, orchid hotel,22 july 2015, the evening was a pool party, i stayed there with children and friends.
 around 10 pm we went to the pool and we sat down, looked at the stars.I and 4 children first saw in the sky a bright star moving randomly and after we see dark disk over us with two strips of light through the blinds.
content.summary: I and 4 children first saw in the sky a bright star moving randomly and after we see dark disk over us with two strips of light through the blinds.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 other friends were bbqing in the back yard when one of my friends told us to come look at some strange lights slowly acending from what looked like the city scape.. now it's important to note that the night was also being lit up by fireworks in celebration of pioneer day.. these were absolutely not fire works! the where hovering slowly then changing direction , and even some of them were moving in sync with each other. one by one they were acending up into the sky.. then out of no where 2 helicopters headed straight in their direction , as the choppers approached the objects one by one they started to phase out.. as some phased out , more showed up shortly after and the helicopters would swing back around and then they would phase out again! this happened for about 15 mins before they all completely disappeared.. it was amazing to watch !
content.summary: 8 orbs acended slowly from city then were chased by a helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my balcony with friends on this partially cloudy by sunny evening in hounslow (london). i noticed a tiny speck in the sky moving slowly. i took a few pictures and have attached some of those.

i've seen ballons and bunch of balloons in the sky earlier, but this was much more higher and much more stable and slow in the way it glided in the sky. it was below the cloudline.

it was visible for a few minutes (5-10) as it was moving slowly and finally it vanished from sight (because it was too far i guess).
content.summary: A complex shape gliding slowly in the evening sky. different from any balloon-bunch or plane

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside onto the deck in my backyard to talk on my cell phone when noticed something in the night sky that looked like shooting stars, but, they were shooting up towards the moon! in fact there were many of these "flashes" zipping about, so i got off the phone to film the moon & make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me. what i caught on tape astounded me. 

when i began to film the moon i was feeling weird as if, i should not be filming and began to feel foggy and confused. the only reason i stopped filming was not because i lost sight of the moon or objects, but because, i felt that i was mechanically driven to cease and go back into the house. once inside, i lost about an hour and a half of time. i was not drinking nor was i tired, as i was very wound up after seeing these things.  it's just odd…the only way to explain what i witnessed, is that the moon was shape-shifting. the moon appeared to drip a massive beam of light that remained stationary, hovering vertically, beneath the moon before returning into the bright face of the moon in an upward flash a few seconds after it disappeared from the (my) field of vision. (not unlike a shooting star going in the wrong direction…up!) video 1:17 long shows what i saw pretty clearly. the encounter was so bizarre that it even completely changed my voice…as i had expressed utter disbelief. note: this is not my first encounter. i have seen ufo's before, up close and too personal--this is just my first time reporting my encounter because i caught the alien shenanigans on tape this time!

as i continued to stare at the moon in shock i kept noticing a saturn orb-like light that just hovered beneath the moon at approx the 5:00 o'clock position in relation to the moons surface. it continued to move slowly about at will so it was not a planet, a big bright star or an aircraft. the video that is 1:07 seconds long, shows this object move from that position (5:00) to the 1:00 o'clock position in the last 2 seconds. (zooming in helped) after i zoomed in i could see so much more, it really has to be seen & observed to be believed. 

i hope that mufon can enhance and clean up these videos and maybe reveal much more than we all expected!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Moon ejects enormous beam of light that hovers…

content.detailedDescription:
When i was approx.12 years old.Me and my father witnessed the craft. it was massive.It was roughly the size of a large house maybe bigger.It was a silver egg shaped craft.Windows on craft,can see entities inside of it staring back at us.Two different kinds of entities are on board,some are very tall and some are short. soon two orbs of light came out of the ship, one blue,one red,the orbs circled the craft,went back in, then a beam of light camefrom out of the craft and focused on our vehicle and filled inside of car with light,when the light hit us were paralyzed and unable move.Then there were entities surrounding vehicle at this point,only fout in total.Two on each side of the car,at the doors. we were taken aboard the ship, we each had implants inserted in our arms,in me on my right elbow,on my father,his hand. next i know we are back in the car,and the ship is still in front of us,a white misty fog is being produced by the ship. it then disappears into thin air,no high speed zoom away. it just simply vanished before my eyes. this happened approx 26years ago i still have the implant in me. would like get it taken out.I have provided a phone number to contact me.Please take this seriously,i wouldnt waste your time or mine. thank you for your time. 
                                                       jason thomas 


ps. as far as evidence goes,i would like to submit my "implant"
content.summary: Seen.Descent.Abduction.Implant in left elbow.

content.detailedDescription:
I have two witnesses!! 1st: around 11pm, my brother and i we're out back having a smoke break. i looked up and pointed out the flicketing "star" to my brother. the same one i see all the time. these things we're extra active that night. my brother looked and looked, then got a shocked look on his face and jolted back. he said "they're real". same thing i did on my first sighting. 
we observed this one turn red, blue, green, and white. adam has better eyes than me. he could see 5 small red lights surrounding this thing that i could not see very well. we stepped into the street to get a better look. adam started looking around the sky and we saw two more, kind of flickering and pulsating red, blue, green & white. he told me, "john, people are going to think we're crazy." i said, yes they will. 
then i asked adam if he wanted to see another one. he looked at me with a weird look. so i took him out front. there, we saw another star like object that is there every night. tonight it was pulsating between light blue, light green & white. no red on this one that night.
so, my brother went home, got my mom to go outside to check it out. she also saw 5 small red lights around the color changing, pulsating, flickering star. since then, they have been checking out the night sky and have seen these objects do more strange thing. they we're watching a couple nights ago and saw it change colors and saw a light beaming out of it, i guess, and rotate around it to one side. my brother also saw a star turn into 2 smaller lights and fly off in two different directions. just like i did a couple months ago. they don't know what to think, but i do. i told them all they have to do is really look. otherwise at a glance, you will think these are stars. ufo's are over huthinson
disguised as stars. there is no other explanation for the activity that i have seen around here fairly steadily since last year.
i really think you guys should come down here with a telescope hooked to a lap top and spend a couple nights checking this crazy stuff out.
i'm sorry i don't have equiptment good enough to take night videos. i'm working on it.
content.summary: Four stationary craft changing colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 1:00am smoking a cigarette after doing some online class work. i live in a creek valley and observed the object flying over the hilltop/treeline from the sw the rapidly make a turn to head in a n-ne. it was traveling too fast to be a plane and gave off no sound.
content.summary: The object came over the hill top, changed direction and left very fast, east to west then to the north

content.detailedDescription: In approximately august of 2003, my girlfriend and i were walking to skylandia park in tahoe city ca at night.  we frequently went there at night to sit on the dock and watch the stars.  on this particular night, we were walking through the park side by side when a pattern of very bright light appeared on the ground directly in front of us.  there were several circles of light about 1' to 2' in diameter that appeared and began to move erratically inside of a circle about 10' to 15' wide.  there was nothing but a large pine tree above us.  i looked up, but did not see anybody, nor did i see any objects.  i have no idea where the light came from.  there were no beams either.  my girlfreind, who is now my ex wife, saw the exact same thing.  the light was extremely bright.  we both watched these circles of light dance around for about a minute or 2 and then they were gone.  i have no explanation for what this could have been, but am hoping someone else may have experienced something similar.
content.summary: Light pattern on ground

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was 10:30pm and i was watching fireworks with my 6 year old son from his bedroom. they were being set off two blocks away at our local stampede grounds due to the stampede being in town. our local stampede grounds are situated right beside local coulee(s) in the area. 

i noticed a small, green, semi dim orb  (slightly larger then a star in the night sky) like figure off to the side of the fireworks, remaining stationary, as if it was observing the fireworks. i averted my attention to the green orb, trying to figure out what it was. i've lived in the neighborhood for 15+ years and had never seen anything like it. 

shortly after the fireworks ended, it started moving slowly towards the center of the stampede before moving back towards where it came from, all the while changing colors from a dim green to red to an orange red. it moved out towards the coulees before making a sharp 'c' type turn  followed by a 's' shaped movement back over to the grounds. it did this back and forth a couple times at various speeds, changing the colors and moving in different directions very sporadically. sometimes it would be red for a long period of time before switching between to green and remaining of orange red for awhile. at one point it emitted a very bright green light that looked like it had 5-7 various beams pointed in different directions from it's midsection and down towards the ground for a few seconds (none were pointed upwards). it has shot up a short distance above the grounds at one point, before 'floating' back down slowly in a straight line to the same level it had been at before. finally, it remained stationary above the grounds, emitted the very bright green light over the stampede (again, it looked like it had 5-7 different beams of light shooting in different directions from it's mid section and down, never in the upwards direction). it remained like this for a minute or two before taking off at a fast pace to where i originally saw it, turning back into a dim green light. it shot then off in a curve like line at a medium like pace over towards the coulees and disappeared behind my neighbors garage.

my 6 year old son was witness to the entire event and he kept asking me what it was, as it confused us both. it definitely did not have the characteristics of any object i have seen before in the sky in the neighborhood, let alone anywhere else. because of the small nature of the object and the distance, i did not pull out my phone to record it (a decision i regret). in total, the object was visible for approximately 15 minutes (my phone showed a time of 10:47pm when it disappeared). i did note that passerby's (i live two houses in from a semi main road) had also noticed the object in the sky, as my son and i heard someone shout 'what the **** is that green thing in the sky?' (i had the window fully opened for my son to listen to the fireworks).
content.summary: Bright/dim orb

content.detailedDescription:
While driving from magog to montreal tonight with my son we noticed a large bright white light in the sky ahead of us (approximtly 9:15 p.M.) it was stationary as we watched it we noticed another one about 20 to thirty kilometers further ahead in the sky the same appearance as the the closer one to us both still not moving not blinking and quite large given the fact that our line of sight of it put it higher than the clouds as we lost sight of 1st one now behind a dark cloud patch, still watching i did catch a glimpsh of it through a hole in the cloud between us and the object. i ask my son to keep looking for it as we were pretty well underneath the area we spotted it, at the same we were watching the second light in the horizon that seemed about 15- 20 km ahead exactly the same appearance as the first one, a large bright white light not blinking and stationary, the sky was all clear except for small dark cloud which came between us and the 2nd object for about 5 seconds and then was visible again, given the distance away and the fact that it was above the clouds and the size and intensity of the light it had to be extremely large, and then as we watched in a single instant it was gone, we were both shaken, in my 52 years of life i have never seen anything like this.
as we watched the sky for any signs of light we did spot a helicopter off to the right
with the usual beacon lights flashing well below the clouds and far off to the left
another micro dot light with beacon lights flashing clearly indentifying it as an aircraft.
i have no explanation for what i witnessed.

while listing to the local news at 11 pm a report of a 2 year old vanishing in the same area, was reported missing from his yard while his farther was cleaning his car, police were called a search lasting 5 hours with dogs found the child in a wooded area in a ditch, with his life in danger.
content.summary: 2 strange large white lighted objects in sky about 20kms apart stationary and not blinking

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:00 while watching fireworks with my fiance, out of the corner of my eye i saw a green triangular object through the tree zoom by then stop and zoom by again. as i pointed it out to my fiancé, we both saw the brightly colored green triangular object zoom past our house towards our backyard. as we watched it, it quickly would zoom in one direction, change direction and go back. as it flied south-west it interacted and spun around a red object that looked just like it and the green one then turned red. the original red one flashed from red to white to yellow as the new red one circled it. the object in the center then seemed to descend while the other shot off super quickly towards the mountains. while watching it, on top of the mountain we saw a huge ball of white light followed by three more red lights that seemed to erupt when the white light vanished. one of the red lights shot off into the sky and disappeared while the other ones flew around in weird patterns around each other. we watched until they all faded away. we were trying to see on our telescope what it was, but we couldn't see it. we caught some of what we saw on video when it was super close to our house. we were freaking out and trying to figure out what we were seeing. we looked to see if known flying objects could act like that, but we didn't find anything that fit what we saw. we tried to watched them as much as possible and we both felt that they were not from this world.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiple triangular lights seen moving and interacting with each other

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard at 623 platte ave in alliance ne and observed 2 orange lights travel from directly overhead (straight up) to ssw and slowly rotated. they started being directly next to each other (north to south) and rotated slowly to being east to west (parallel) while they were heading ssw. the 2 objects appeared to be lower than a standard satellite orbit but higher than any plane (probably 50,000 to 80,000 feet above sea level). the sighting happened at 9:59 for about 10 seconds and covered roughly 30-40 degrees of arc. witnessed by me and my wife.
content.summary: 2 orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some pictures of the clouds. after took a picture of the clothes i saw it hase blue radiating light coming from a cloud making his z shape going up to the sky and disappearing. right away i know it was a ufo because they or  hear every where in lynwood california. what grabbed my attention was that bright blue light not going straight but in the zigzag motion and disappearing in the sky.After editing and cropped one picture on july 3rd 2013 at 2:45 i saw a hovering craft, what seems to be human shaped shadowy figure on top of the object. i wasn't scared because my mind was straight on thinking that they can't touch us because the power we us,is there life source.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It's hovering over the building a silver shape disk. and there seems to be a black shadowy figure standing above it.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a thursday evening at about 8:15 pm (cst). i was traveling from my home in lewisville, and headed southbound on edmonds ln between sh3040 and sh121. i was ultimately headed toward grapevine, texas to sing karaoke at a local venue.  i really wish that i could have taken a pic of the event, but it happened rather quickly, and i was riding my harley at the time.

please understand that i reside in the flight-path for dfw airport, and am quite familiar with landing aircraft at dfw.  the light i saw was bright white, and too large to be a commercial airliner.  additionally, wind current at dfw is typically from the south as it was on that evening, and the typical aircraft approach to dfw is from the north.  the bright light i saw reminded me of a "shooting star" in speed, but it certainly was not that either. it was going entirely too fast to be a commercial airliner.

what truly surprised me the most, was that during that "moment", i noticed that an arriving aircraft was in the "pattern" for dfw airport. that arriving flight was forced to take an "evasive action" on approach for dfw airport to avoid collision with the flying object (moving east to west). i noticed the approaching flight make a swift adjustment to it's right while lifting it's right wing abruptly to avoid collision.

then i noticed the "unknown to me object" continue traveling to the west over the horizon. the one thing i noticed about the assumed ufo is that it was mostly a very fast white light that seemed to arc over the western horizon.  the light was so intense, and the speed of the object was so fast that it appeared to have a "light trail".  i know for fact that it was not "space junk" re-entering our atmosphere, and it was not the right color to be a meteor.

as i continued my travels onto sh121 heading west toward grapevine, i kept looking to my west looking for some kind of "crash event". possibly like an explosion or police activity. but, i didn't see anything further to indicate that something had gone wrong.

it was just weird! i cannot say that it was an "orb", or that it had any particular shape to it.  however, if it had been a "falling object" from our skies, i still believe that there would have been some type of fire or explosion event that would have been noticeable in my travels to the west. that is what leaves me with the impression that it was some "type" of controlled flying object.
content.summary: Bright white light arching over horizone from east to west in flight-path of dfw airport

content.detailedDescription:
Bright golden straight on lava tube that changed direction and then came back on same path before disappearing.  then very bright light behind the mesa like a meteor or bomb went off.
 
just went to bed and looking toward the south at the stars.
 
it was coming straight at me.
 
looked like a lava tube but should not have been since it wasn't in a volcano.
 
came straight at me, bright golden light for several seconds then made an "s" curve and then came straight at me before disappearing.  right after, a very bright light lit up the whole sky behind it, bright yellow orange.  nothing at all like any lightning i'd ever seen.
 
i thought the entire thing was just beautiful and went to sleep later peacefully.
 
it disappeared before it got to me.
content.summary: Bright golden straight on lava tube that changed direction and then came back on same path before disappearing.  then very bright light behind the mesa like a meteor or bomb went off.

content.detailedDescription: Walking from where i lived to purchase a snack from street vendor and i saw a ufo cloud nw of me.   took a picture,  walked a block away and when i came back approximately 10 min later the cloud was disintegrating.
content.summary: Ufo cloud, very circular and round; looked artifially round

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the back deck around dusk and heard a mechanical noise to the nw that i had never heard before.  i went inside to get my husband and upon return the noise had stopped.  shortly after the noise, i noticed the speed of the object.  because of the height of the object i thought i might be looking at a satellite until the 90 degree turn. i followed the object across the sky.  the object began to flash a bright yellow-orange light and then disappeared.  this event was also witnessed by my husband.  

the same mechanical noise was heard by my husband on thursday, july 23 at approximately 23:50. extreme cloud cover inhibited any view of the sky.
content.summary: "mechanical" noise heard in the nw of location.  object was observed after noise.Object observed in pularis moving s. made 90 degree turn and traveled e.Object pulsated and emitted orange and silver lights before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Looking up, saw a star like light but moving very fast, much higher than the airplane that was also in the sky.  it moved over the horizon within 2-3 minutes. few clouds in the sky, stars visible.
content.summary: Extremely fast (compared to nearby aircraft) much higher like a star

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i have witnessed a beautiful luminous ufo while opening up my bay window. it hovered for approximately ten seconds as we were speechless. it them seemed to tilt slightly and move very slowly through the treetops. i ran outside because i was completely shocked at what my eyes were seeing so clearly. my husband ran to our bathroom window to get a better look. meanwhile i am outside trying to understand what just happened. i looked to my right and there it is again incredibly low. i yelled for my husband and he ran outside and he saw the ufo again with me. it seemed to hover for another ten seconds and then it was just gone. it never made a ssound.
content.summary: I shut off my air conditioner and opened by bay window and my husband screamed. i looked out the window and was awe struck. i was staring at a hovering diamond space ufo with very bright red and white lights. i am so grateful my husband witnessed it with

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i just moved to vegas from boston, we choose to drive. we were on our way from reno to las vegas and out route put us on route 375. we were completely unaware of the significants of this road at the time. as were driving in the distance beyond the ridge line we began to see flashes of light, similar to a transformer blowing up. however the flashes were emitting a light much brighter than a blown transformer and the flashes were coming from different parts of the ridge rather then one select area. i thought i might have been heat lighting, but there were not clouds or heat to justify such a conclusion. plus the light was grounded rather than airborne. we exited the car to try to see what was going on. i looked to my left and in the corner ridge maybe a mile away i saw a red beam of light head directly towards the grown at a rapid speed and then begin to expand as it got closer to the ground. then it disappeared as fast it appeared. i thought nothing of it at the time because i am not going to jump and say something is not of this world when it was close enough or seen long enough to scare me into believing it was something of significants. then my friend tapped me on the shoulder and pointed at a bright white beam of light heading towards the ground then curve south east. the light was maybe 300 yards away and as it got closer to the ground it began to expand just like the red beam. but then a blue circular mass appeared. i can't say it was a ball of light or a gas because thought it was not clearly defined in sense of having sharp edges but it had blurred definition but the light was contained in a shape without a doubt. then within the blue light what looked like small bolts of lighting began to appear but were contained without the light it self. then as it got closer to the ground a solid dark object appeared at the based of the light with 10 to 12 red lights at the based of the object. the mass was maybe 300 years away.  all masses began to slow down. we could feel the pressure of the object and we had the sense the air was electrified but there was no noise what so ever. we quickly got into the car and drove to where we were staying. i did research the next day and quickly realized we were right next to groom lake and wondered if what we saw was what i dared not mention. i have lived many places. including next to the air force base in burlington vt. i have seen war games done by the government and i have seen flares and black hawks fly in odd formations during simulations. i have lived next to the submarine base and coast guard academy, i know what military lights on aircrafts and vehicles look like and how they can be mistaken for something they are not.  this was nothing i have seen, there was zero explanation. if i had to say what it was. i would say it was an object deciding out of a highly active particle mass.
content.summary: 2 masses observed over route 375
